original_text:
The pride of your heart has deceived you,
    you who live in the clefts of the rock,
    in your lofty dwelling,
who say in your heart,
    “Who will bring me down to the ground?”
korean_text: 너의 마음의 교만이 너를 속였도다 바위 틈에 거주하며 높은 곳에 사는 자여 네가 마음에 이르기를 누가 능히 나를 땅에 끌어내리겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: The pride of your heart has deceived you
you who live in the clefts of the rock
“Who will bring me down to the ground?”
